details.name: Mziyanda
details.bio: Hi, my name is Mziyanda Joko but you can call me Joko My passion for coding began during high school, since then I was sold and wanted to know more and the journey never stopped ever since. I am also a sports person and play Cricket on weekends when I am not coding something on the side

workesperience.address: Cape Town, Unit 1A, 31 Bell Crescent, Westlake Business Park, Westlake Cape Town
description: Collaborated with designers and project managers to create and customize WordPress websites for clients in various industries – Food and Beverages, FMCG, Hospitality
Developed custom WordPress themes and plugins using HTML, CSS, JavaScript
Managed website updates and maintenance, ensuring all plugins and themes were up- to-date and functioning properly
Optimized website speed and performance, including image optimization and caching - SEO
Utilized Google Analytics and other tools to monitor website traffic and identify areas for improvement
Implemented SEO best practices, including keyword research and on-page optimization, HTML, JavaScript, SCSS, Elementor, child themes, Elementor new Containers
workesperience.tools: WordPress, Elementor editor and other plugins for different purposes like toolset for dynamic content

workesperience.address: Cape Town, Unit 1A, 31 Bell Crescent, Westlake Business Park, Westlake Cape Town
description: Collaborated with cross-functional teams to design and develop WordPress websites for clients in the healthcare industry
Customized existing WordPress themes and plugins to meet client requirements
Implemented website security measures, including SSL certificates and firewalls
Conducted testing and debugging to ensure website features and plugins were functioning properly across all devices and browsers
Assisted with website content management
JavaScript, CSS, Elementor, child themes, Custom toolset

description: Worked as a freelancer developer for more than two projects – Yoga App, an exercise and habit tracker built with Flutter and Finlight, and investment management static website using Bootstrap, Jquery, CSS
Responsible for creating front-end services for web development and hybrid app development.
Designed, developed, and implemented software applications for website based on analyzed requirements and understanding of industry technical standards.
workesperience.tools: HTML, JavaScript, Less, Flutter framework, Dart, Trello boards, Bitbucket and Jira.

description: Developing Ayaamah beauty App with Flutter and dart – Scheduling for neighborhood barbershops and salons
